General.Name: dentalcorp Holdings Ltd
General.Description: dentalcorp Holdings Ltd., through its subsidiaries, acquires and partners with dental practices to provide health care services in Canada. The company was formerly known as Dentalcorp Overbite Ltd. dentalcorp Holdings Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 181 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2T3
